content:
I am Jorge and welcome to my personal page.
I am Full Stack Developer focused on web applications. In my career I have used several technologies to build web apps such as Java, PHP, Laravel, Bootstrap, Bulma, Javascript, Vue.js, React, Angular and much more. I use my spare time to learn new technologies and build useful things for myself and for people in general. I have also some interest in Mobile Development.
Besides my life as a Developer, I also have background with Machine Learning and Data Science, using Python along with Keras and TensorFlow. I have worked on a few projects and have special ability with Facial Expression Recognition (FER).
summary:

An app built with Flask to predict heart disease based on informed features. Also features an Angular frontend to visualize the prediction.
title: Heart Disease Classifier

summary: Application that manages events and courses ocurring at Maranh√£o Court of Accounts. Features registration, attendance and certification.
title: Sophia

summary: My undergraduate thesis. It uses CNNs to learn emotions from human faces. The hyperparameters are automatically tuned using meta learning.
title: AI Facial Expression Recognition

summary: Web application to help Computer Science students from UFMA in selection of classes in each semester. Built with Laravel, Bulma and SQLite.
title: Computer Science Planner
